original_text: Technology is evolving rapidly. Artificial intelligence and machine learning are transforming the way we work and live. From voice assistants to medical diagnosis, these tools are improving efficiency and accuracy. However, ethical considerations and responsible development are critical as we move forward
translation: 技术正在迅速发展.人工智能和机器学习正在改变我们工作和生活的方式.从语音助手到医疗诊断,这些工具正在提高效率和准确性.然而,在我们前进时,道德考虑和负责任的发展至关重要
